about_the_game:
Elden Gunfire is a comic, funny and cute online multiplayer third person shooter game for everyone with cute cartoon 3D next generation graphics and captivating gameplay.
Choose your unique character and weapons from many different characters and weapons of different classes and styles (Assault, SMG, Sniper, Shotgun, Knife, Pistol, Grenades, LMG, Heavy Machine Guns, Grenade Launcher, Laser Pistol , Water Gun, Electric Gun, Lava Gun, Flame Thrower....) each with particular properties. Customize your own combat perks and dive into the action, join the battle and engage in team-based online PvP battles against other players around the world on a variety of maps.
Play with or against your friends in online or private team deathmatches.
Our game supports a very advanced bot system, so if there are not enough real players online to join the match, the game will connect advanced bots that react exactly like real players to keep every match with exactly 5 vs 5 players, they will join the match. with custom names, they can choose custom classes with equipment, custom soldiers, they can run, shoot, aim, jump, dodge, hide, camp everything real players can do, so this game will never die Even though there are no online players overall, the game is still fun to play against extremely intelligent bots.
And as many of you has asked for a game mode against bots only in our previous titles, we are glad to tell you that this game has a bots only mode where you play only against bots, so in total:
-online match against real players and bots
-private match with your friends and no bots
-local match against bots only and no real players
more modes are coming soon.
The controls are intuitive and super easy to master with a smooth interface.
Regular content updates, including new characters, weapons, bombs, skills and maps.
Stunning graphics, cute sound effects, epic war effects and beautiful music create a fun cartoon atmosphere.
